short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Meet NOVA: Your Personal Productivity Assistant

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
NOVA is designed to revolutionize your task management and boost productivity. 
Serving as your personal productivity assistant, NOVA seamlessly integrates into your web browser, offering an intuitive and user-friendly interface to help you stay organized and focused.

With NOVA, you can effortlessly create, prioritize, and organize tasks directly from your browser, ensuring that nothing slips through the cracks.

Nova integrating into your browser deeply,  you can add the google search engine results into your schedule.
